howToGetIt: Register for activities, reserve a space, purchase swim passes and other memberships, LOG IN If you need any assistance, please call (415) 831-6800 or email sfreconline@sfgov.org.
cost: To purchase a swim pass or register for a class, visit sfrecpark.org/register. Drop-in visitors can pay the entry fee with exact cash or credit card at the pool entrance.
